医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
新的AI语音筛查方法改善了焦虑和抑郁的检测国家超级计算应用中心和伊利诺伊大学医学院皮奥里亚大学（UICOMP）的科学家是发表在《美国声学学会杂志》上发表的研究论文的作者，该论文表现出了改善的，自动化的，自动化的焦虑和主要抑郁症和主要抑郁症的筛查方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/new-ai-voice-screening-method-improves-detection-of-andoxiety-and-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/new-ai-voice-screening-method-method-improves-detection of-andoxiety-and-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c85358-D616-4EAA-9042-ABB15CF978B0 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 14:20:38 -0400 New AI voice screening method improves detection of anxiety and depression
新的遗传发现阐明了与PHTS相关的血管畸形在发育过程中，细胞生长，扩展和迁移，以高度控制的方式生成组织和器官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/new-genetic-discovery-sheds-light-on-phts-phts-phts-phts-phts-phts-phts-phts-cancular-cancular-malformations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/new-genetic-discovery-sheds-light-on-phts-phts-phts-phts-phts-phts-phts-clascular-malformations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B6519569-499E-4514-AD34-AD34-50CEBBB8C6E6E Mon, 31 Mar 2025 14:00:11 -0400 New genetic discovery sheds light on PHTS-related vascular malformations
人工智能工具预测病毒爆发热点一种新的人工智能工具可以通过识别可能携带和传播能够感染人类的​​病毒的动物物种来帮助限制甚至预防大流行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/artcover-intelligence-tool-predicts-virus uper uper uper-hotspots.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/Artcover-intelligence-tool-predicts-virus uper uper-hotspots.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcc8c4bb-b588-47df-9326-4cd8aee977E7F Mon, 31 Mar 2025 13:22:56 -0400 Artificial intelligence tool predicts virus outbreak hotspots
新的虚拟现实系统旨在彻底改变精神病诊断研究人员已经开发了一个基于虚拟现实的系统，该系统在改善常见心理健康状况之间的差异方面显示出了希望，这可能为早期和更个性化的治疗铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/new-virtual-reality-system-system-aims-to-revolution-possichiatize-pershicatize-pershicati sphysiatric-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/new-virtual-reality-system-system-aims-to-revolution-possichiatize-pershicatize-persichiatiric-diacnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33062c3e-79E9-4949-9437-9437-39CF7F04D8F5 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 12:55:37 -0400 New virtual reality system aims to revolutionize psychiatric diagnosis
AI模型在检测牙齿X射线中检测牙源性鼻窦炎方面具有很高的精度Ateneo智能视觉环境（Alive）和国际研究人员的实验室开发了一种深度学习模型，旨在彻底改变牙科，并能够以98.2％的精度识别牙科X射线中的牙齿和鼻窦结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/ai-model-achieves-high-accuracy-in-detecting-odontogeninic-sinasisition-indental-x-Rays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/ai-model-achieves-high-accuracy-in-detecting-detecting-odontogeninic-sinasinic-sinusitis-indental-x-rays.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4aac209-7F00-4F24-9933-7E868566D731 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 12:46:40 -0400 AI model achieves high accuracy in detecting odontogenic sinusitis in dental X-rays
血液测试可深入了解阿尔茨海默氏症的舞台和严重性根据华盛顿大学圣路易斯医学院和瑞典隆德大学的一项研究，针对阿尔茨海默氏病的新开发的血液检查不仅有助于诊断神经退行性状况的诊断，而且还表明了它的进展程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/blood-test-count-inder-ingight-insight-into-into-alzheimers-stage-and-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/blood-test-count--intot--insight-into-into-alzheimers-s-s-s------------er-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fed08647-0F66-4AC2-A8FD-5C8C70307082 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 12:36:13 -0400 Blood test offers insight into Alzheimer's stage and severity
瑞典研究人员确定与动脉粥样硬化有关的遗传变异瑞典研究人员已经确定了增加动脉粥样硬化风险的遗传变异。目的是使这些新发现能够早期发现动脉粥样硬化并改善对心脏病发作和中风等心血管疾病的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/swedish-researchers-ressearch-sindify-genetify-genetify-genetify-gariants-nink----------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/swedish-researchers-ressearch-sindify-genetify-genetify-genetify-variants-link---to to-athersclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09540C28-0113-4D39-AD04-D1C4D5861307 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 12:26:00 -0400 Swedish researchers identify genetic variants linked to atherosclerosis
液体限制不能改善心力衰竭患者的健康状况根据美国心脏病学院年度科学学院提出的一项研究，长期建议患有心力衰竭的人每天限制他们每天消耗的液体以帮助减少充血，或者肺部和四肢的液体堆积，但该建议没有任何好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/fluid-restriction-does-not-improve-health-nealth-nealth-neart-failure-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/fluid-restriction-does-not-improve-health-nealth-in-realth-neart-failure-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AA119E3D-A514-447D-8724-BB5B5B8423AF8D Mon, 31 Mar 2025 08:06:38 -0400 Fluid restriction does not improve health in heart failure patients
三部曲阀在治疗主动脉反流方面表现出安全性和有效性根据美国心脏科学学院的一项研究，接受了经过病原主动脉反流的瓣膜的经经经典主动脉瓣置换（TAVR）的患者的总体死亡率在一年时的总死亡率仅为8.1％，远低于试验的预先指定的目标25％，以表现出非劣质性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/trilogy-valve-dymstrates-safety-and-effectives-in-treating-aortic-regurgitation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/trilogy-valve-dymstrates-safety-and-effective-in--feltectives-in-warting-aortic-aortic-regurgitation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= e6fffbc3-0f50-4cc6-a6cf-6f-6ffceccc75972 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 07:51:19 -0400 Trilogy valve demonstrates safety and effectiveness in treating aortic regurgitation
栓塞保护装置不会降低TAVR程序中的中风率根据美国心脏病学学院的一项随机试验，旨在去除栓塞材料的设备 - 在经导管主动脉瓣置换期间可以释放到血液中的组织碎片。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/embolic-protection-device-does-not-reduce-stroke-rate-rate-in-tavr-procedure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/embolic-protection-device-does-does-not-reduce-stroke-stroke-rate-in-tavr-procedure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46dfd0c3-d175-4caf-8bee-2fa18c9cbbbbf Mon, 31 Mar 2025 07:43:55 -0400 Embolic protection device does not reduce stroke rate in TAVR procedure
